Claim: "A man jumped from one boulder to another."
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsJumpedFrom(a,b))) & (forall e (forall h (forall f (forall g ( IsJumpedFrom(e,f) ->  IsJumpingFrom(g,h)))))) & (forall k (forall j (forall i (forall l ( IsJumpingFrom(i,j) ->  IsJumpedFrom(k,l))))))) -> (exists c (exists d (IsJumpingFrom(c,d))))
